sentences.en: I had to knock the branches back to reach the hut.
sentences.cn: 我得把树枝推开后才能到达棚屋.

sentences.en: In the lightning I saw that the roof of the hut had been blown off.
sentences.cn: 闪电的时候,我看见棚屋的屋顶被掀掉了.

sentences.en: It's not a house but a glorified hut.
sentences.cn: 那不是一所房子,而是美化了的小木屋.

sentences.en: Kunta ran blindly toward his grandmother's hut.
sentences.cn: 昆塔马上撒开腿不顾一切地向他奶奶的茅屋奔去.

sentences.en: The fire quickly consumed the wooden hut.
sentences.cn: 火焰很快地吞噬了那所小木屋.

sentences.en: The horses died in the fire because they were barred in the hut.
sentences.cn: 马在火灾中被烧死,因为它们被关在马棚里.

sentences.en: The hut isn't safe; it was just flung together.
sentences.cn: 这个棚子不安全, 它不过是匆忙搭起来的.

sentences.en: The hut was constructed from trees that grew in the nearby forest.
sentences.cn: 这棚屋是用附近森林里长的树木建造的.

sentences.en: The little prefabricated hut was lifted away by a huge crane.
sentences.cn: 那间用预制板搭建的小棚屋被一辆大型起重机吊走了。

sentences.en: The old man knocked up a hut for mountain - climbers.
sentences.cn: 那位老人给爬山者草草地搭成一小茅屋.

sentences.en: The poor old man lived in a little wooden hut.
sentences.cn: 那个贫穷的老人住在一间小木屋内.
这小栅子摇摇晃晃很不稳.

sentences.en: The wooden hut was consumed by fire.
We all set to and soon built a rough hut.
sentences.cn: 我们大干起来,很快搭起一间简单的棚屋.

sentences.en: We rammed the soil flat before we built the hut.
sentences.cn: 我们建房之前把土面夯实.

words.tran_cn: 临时营房；在临时营房住宿

trans.tran_cn: 小屋，棚屋，临时营房，牢房
trans.tran_en: a small simple building with only one or two rooms
